main event: A witness in Milan, Indiana observed a bright, round object in the sky that emitted a whirring sound and appeared to be breaking up.
interesting points: The object was about half the size of the moon,The object made a sound likened to a thrown insect,The sighting lasted for about 3-4 minutes,The object disappeared from view straight up,Investigators concluded that the sighting was likely a meteor.
witness description: John L. Hindman, male, mechanic, age 37
